articles.title: Meghan Markle Skipping Charles' Coronation Is 'Brilliant,' Experts Say - Insider

articles.content:
Less than a month until King Charles' coronation, Meghan Markle and Prince Harry finally gave an answer to the much-anticipated question of whether they are attending. The answer? Kind of.

articles.author: Tara Gonzalez
articles.title: Mary Quant, The Mother of the Miniskirt, Has Died - Harper's BAZAAR
articles.description: The trailblazing British designer did more than just shorten hemlines; her clothing made woman feel alive.
articles.content:
Dame Mary Quant, the British designer known as the mother of the miniskirt, has died at age 93. "Good taste is death," she once famously said. "Vulgarity is life." 
Quant did not like clothes as the… [+3949 chars]
